attributes.action: Give to people the right to obtain Covid Pass for international travel…
attributes.additional_details: People who recovered from Covid-19 and were severely ill developed strong immune response and have large amount of antibodies. Those people are being discriminated as they don’t necessarily need to be vaccinated and that way they are losing their freedom to travel without any restrictions. The main idea people to be vaccinated is to build an immunity agains the virus. It’s nonsense people with antibodies to be vaccinated.
attributes.background: Give to people the right to obtain Covid Pass for international travel, if they have antibodies in present after recovering from Covid-19, no matter the time frame.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599298
